esema danata siduwi athi pura widyathmaka paryeshana thulin wijayage paminimatath pera enam kri.pu 6 weni siyawasata pera yugayata ayathwana diyunu nagarayak (eya dakunu aasiyawe pradhana welada madhyasthanayak wa pawathi bawata sakshi labi atha) anuradhapura athulunuwara kanim walin soyagena atha.
janasathu kirima athi uwamanawata deshapalanika menma aarthika hethun atha.

shri lanka nidahas paksha mulasthanaye eeye (14da) pawathi madhya hamuwakadi arjun alosiyas mahatha sakshi labadima prathikshepa kirima sambandhayen madhyawedin nangu panayakata pilithuru demin amathyawaraya me bawa pawasiya.bandumkara komisama hamuwe sakshi nodena hamotama adhikaranaya hamuwe aniwaryayenma sakshi dimata siduwana bawada ehidi sakshi dimata nohaki bawa katath kiwa nohaki bawada hethema kiya sitiyeya.
ee wagema thamayi wayasgatha wimedi oonama kenekuge asthi durwala wenawa.
